title: Agregar opción de generar Orden de Trabajo
description: UI component and linkage to the backend conversion logic; directly supports the quote-to-order workflow.

title: Modificar Estado de cotizacion
description: Involves adding interactive UI elements and a backend API endpoint to update the quote's status, crucial for managing the quote's lifecycle.

title: Implica la opción de modificar una cotización
description: Requires a mechanism to load quote data into an editable form (reusing new_quote.html or a dedicated edit_quote.html), and robust backend API endpoints for updating existing quotes. Essential for corrections and adjustments.

title: Capacidad de generar pdf
description: Involves integrating a PDF generation library on the backend to convert quote details into a printable document, a common business requirement.

title: En el desglose de totales agregar Utilidad , IVA
description: Already Implemented (Quick Win)

title: Agregar función para dar de Alta Clientes / Creación de Tabla de Clientes / Creación de Vista Lista Clientes
description: Building a client management system (new models, CRUD APIs, UI for creation, editing, and listing clients) is a significant sub-project. Improves usability but not strictly blocking.

title: Modificar el nombre del dropdown "Product BOM" por al más legible
description: Already Implemented (Quick Win)

title: La descripción del ITEM debe ser un concatenado de "Tipo Venta", "Linea de acero", "Producto","Vidrio" y "dimensiones"
description: Involves JavaScript logic in new_quote.html to dynamically generate the description based on multiple inputs, improving data consistency and reducing manual entry errors.

title: Cuando se agreguen las dimensiones por el usuario se debe de calcular en vivo el desglose por material y el costo del producto
description: Requires substantial frontend JavaScript logic for real-time calculations and updates, potentially with dedicated backend endpoints for quick calculations. Significantly enhances user experience.

title: Agregar capacidad de modificar las variables de Mano de Obra, Utilidad, Gasto Indirecto, IVA cuando se genera una cotización
description: Involves adding UI input fields, updating the QuoteRequest model, and modifying the calculate_complete_quote function. Crucial for flexible pricing and accommodating business changes.

title: Actualmente la mano de obra esta asociada a nivel producto, vamos a simplificarlo y calcular la mano de obra a nivel cotización
description: Requires refactoring the labor cost calculation logic in calculate_complete_quote and possibly calculate_window_item_from_bom to apply a single rate or aggregated calculation at the quote level.

title: Agregar Kanban de seguimiento de pedidos
description: Involves new UI components, state management, and backend logic for order lifecycle; a distinct feature from quoting.

title: Agregar propiedad de Estado a las cotizaciones
description: Requires model modification, backend logic for status updates, and UI integration across new_quote, view_quote, and quotes_list pages for setting and display. Critical for workflow management.

title: Las cotizaciones deben de poder convertirse en órdenes de trabajo
description: Fundamental next step in the workflow after a quote is accepted; requires new data models and dedicated API endpoints.

title: Actualmente los perfiles tienen un solo precio se necesita crear la entidad "Color" y que un perfil pueda tener multiples colores con precios asociados al color
description: Requires significant changes to the AppMaterial data model, extensive updates to ProductBOMService to handle color-specific pricing, and complex UI modifications to manage these variations in the materials_catalog.html and products_catalog.html.

title: funcionalidad de importar csv y exportar para cargas masivas
description: Adds UI for import/export and backend API endpoints for parsing and generating CSV files. Improves efficiency for managing large datasets.

title: Agregar propiedad de código de producto para estandarizar nomenclatura a estándares de la industria
description: Involves adding a code field to the AppMaterial model and integrating it into the ProductBOMService and relevant UI. Enhances data standardization.

title: Capacidad de duplicar cotización
description: Requires a backend API endpoint to copy an existing quote's data and a UI button to trigger this action. Improves efficiency for creating similar quotes.

title: Capacidad de Editar Cotización
description: As identified under "View Quote", this is a critical feature for quote management, allowing users to modify existing quotes without starting from scratch.

title: Ver que cuando se actualizen precios no se modifiquen los precios de cotizacines anteriores => Historial de preicos
description: Already Handled by Current Design. The current system captures the calculated prices at the time of quote creation, ensuring historical consistency without needing a separate feature.
